# ui-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

UiButton web component

<ui-button />

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute | Description                | Type      | Default |
| ----------- | --------- | -------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `isLoading` | `loading` | Enables the loader loading | `boolean` | `false` |
| `label`     | `label`   | Button label               | `string`  | `''`    |
